title: BigFish Games - Hidden in Time  Mirror Mirror with Strategy Guid
description:
Hidden in Time: Mirror Mirror 


Do you come from royal blood or indentured servitude? Use your sleuthing skills to find out in 
Hidden In Time: Mirror, Mirror. Having found an antique mirror said to have magical properties, 
you set off to Castle Fairwich to investigate its shady history and unlock its true potential. 
Scour dusty rooms in the castle, spot differences reflected in your mirror, and play plenty of 
unique mini games.


    * Search an ancient castle
    * Great mini games
    * Intriguing story line


System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista
CPU: 800 Mhz
RAM: 512 MB
DirectX: 8.1
Hard Drive: 75 MB
